ci_fit_plotters.plot_fit_individuals(fit=fit,
    should_plot_noise_scaling_maps=True, output_path=ci_fit_plotter_path,
    output_format='png')
assert ci_fit_plotter_path + 'fit_noise_scaling_maps.png' not in plot_patch.paths
ci_fit_plotters.plot_fit_individuals(fit=fit_hyper,
    should_plot_noise_scaling_maps=True, output_path=ci_fit_plotter_path,
    output_format='png')
assert ci_fit_plotter_path + 'fit_noise_scaling_maps.png' in plot_patch.paths
